title: Taken
plot: A retired CIA operative uses his skills to rescue his kidnapped daughter in Paris.

title: Mission: Impossible – Fallout
plot: Ethan Hunt and his team race against time after a mission goes wrong, with high-stakes chases through Paris.

title: The Bourne Identity
plot: A man with amnesia tries to discover his true identity while being pursued by assassins in Europe.

title: Amélie
plot: A whimsical Parisian woman decides to change the lives of those around her for the better.

title: Skyfall
plot: Bond investigates an attack on MI6 as secrets from M's past come back to haunt her.

title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
plot: A retired intelligence officer is asked to investigate a suspected Soviet mole within MI6.

title: Midnight in Paris
plot: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
plot: In the early 1960s, a CIA agent and KGB operative join forces against a mysterious criminal organization.

title: Ronin
plot: A team of ex-special operatives is hired to steal a mysterious briefcase, leading to dangerous chases through France.

title: Atomic Blonde
plot: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate a murder and recover a missing list of double agents.
